title: it may sound like a green-horn question but...
content:
...how on earth do i change the “My account” picture from My account\>Edit\>Upload picture? On typophile site of course.

I‘ve been trying to change it in a million ways but the old image doesn‘t stop poping back out, even thought i uploaded a new image. Is there a problem with JPG images? I even tryed to upload the picture from another PC. :D

Any help? please...

Cheers ;)

 [‹ Deberny et Peignot examples?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907035210/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41899 "Go to previous forum topic") [Why is the type design industry so secretive about sales volume? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907035210/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35958 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marosi_lorant

comments.content: Is your picture rgb and right size? If it’s cmyk it won’t work.
yes, it is RGB and right size: 60x60 px, 2.4 Kb
You have to empty your browser’s cache.
